description: React component for admin dashboard page handling user account requests, including fetching requests, approving, rejecting, and modal dialogs for user interactions.

methods.name: fetchUserRequests
methods.description: Fetches user account requests from API and updates state.

methods.name: fetchAllRequests
methods.description: Fetches all user requests and manages loading/error states.

methods.name: handleApproveUser
methods.description: Handles approval of a user account request, including API call and UI updates.

methods.name: handleRejectUser
methods.description: Handles rejection of a user account request, including API call and UI updates.

methods.name: getRoleColor
methods.description: Returns CSS classes for role-based color coding.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats date string into localized date/time string.
